botan.pbe.pbe

PBE

abstract class PBE: botan.filters.filter.Filter, botan.filters.filter.Filterable;
Password Based Encryption (PBE) Filter.

abstract const Vector!ubyte encodeParams();
DER encode the params (the number of iterations and the salt value)

Returns:
encoded params

abstract const OID getOid();
Get this PBE's OID.

Returns:
object identifier
